sentences.en: Interior decoration by careful coordination seems to have had its day.
sentences.cn: 精心搭配的室内装饰似乎已不再受欢迎了。

sentences.en: Rot is eating away the interior of the house.
sentences.cn: 房子内部正逐渐受到侵蚀。

sentences.en: The boat's interior badly needed painting.
The decision was made on the recommendation of the Interior Minister.
sentences.cn: 决议是根据内政部部长的提议作出的。

sentences.en: The interior design is pleasingly simple.
sentences.cn: 室内设计简约朴素，令人惬意。

sentences.en: The interior flatlands and valleys are thickly planted with coconuts.
sentences.cn: 内陆的平地和山谷中种着茂密的椰子树。

sentences.en: The interior has recently been extensively restored.
sentences.cn: 室内最近大规模地整修过.

sentences.en: The interior of Corsica is high and untamed.
sentences.cn: 科西嘉岛腹地地势高企，环境荒芜。

sentences.en: The interior of the church was dark.
The interior of the house was furnished with heavy, old-fashioned pieces.
sentences.cn: 房子里摆放着笨重的旧式家具。

sentences.en: The interior of the shop still retains a nineteenth-century atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 这家商店的内部装修仍然保留着19世纪的风格。

sentences.en: The interior walls are all painted white.
sentences.cn: 室内墙壁都粉刷成了白色。

sentences.en: The interior was shielded from the curious gaze of passersby.
sentences.cn: 屋子内部被挡住了，以防路人好奇地张望。

sentences.en: The ship's interior was an utter shambles.
There is a simplicity about the interior which comes close to blandness.
sentences.cn: 室内布置得很简单，几乎有点平淡无奇。

sentences.en: There is water in the interior of the cave.
They went into the interior room.

words.tran_cn: 使看法深入内心；使成内景

phrases.tran_cn: 室内建筑，室内设计；室内建筑学
室内设计；室内装饰；内部装饰业

trans.tran_cn: 内部的，内地的，国内的，内面的

trans.tran_en: the inner part or inside of something
the inner part or inside of something
